Detailed Description

Describe an error condition in the sonar map classes.

This class implements the error handling in the map classes using C++ exceptions. Currently two error types are defined, Range and Internal.

To add your own error codes / conditions make a derived class with its own error type enumeration and variable and reimplement type2str(). Your constructor should then call the base constructor with a error type of "Extended" and an explanation string.

Definition at line 25 of file map_store_error.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum mapstore::MapStoreError::MapStoreErrorType

Defined error categories.

Enumerator
Range 

Some cell coordinates are outside the allowed range.

Internal 

Internal logic error. Generally indicate a bug in the MapStore class and/or its support classes.

Generic 

General unexplained error. Used as a catch-all.

Extended 

Reserved for derived classes. 

  This error code should be used in derived error classes to
  indicate that more specific information may be available
  in the derived class.
Format 

File format error on loading a map from a file.

Definition at line 53 of file map_store_error.h.

mapstore::MapStoreError::MapStoreError ( MapStoreErrorType  err_a,
const char *  msg 
)
inline

Construct error of given type err_a and explanation msg.

The message msg must be a static allocated string, it must not be a heap or stack object!

It is allowed to pass a Null pointer as msg.
